hero.title: A Home for War3 Players and Creators
hero.tagline: A Warcraft III map community built by players, for players, and growing together with creators
hero.description: The future of this website is not decided by us alone, but by everyone together.

features.title: Open + Win-Win
features.subtitle: We are an open and win-win Warcraft III map community where players and creators can interact, share, and grow together.
features.optimizedSeoDesc: If you are a regular user, you can upload Warcraft III maps here and share them with other users. You can upload map files, cloud storage links, or even share your own game videos.
features.highPerformanceDesc: If you are a Warcraft III map creator, you can claim your maps here. Here you can share your maps, share your tutorials, development progress, and collect feedback from fans. You can even link to your personal social media.
features.tailwindDesc: Whether you are a regular user or a map creator, you can participate in community building here. You can share your maps, tutorials, and even vote on which features to add to the website.

openSource.title: Open Source & Community
openSource.description: Join the modern web development revolution. This project is open for everyone to use, learn from, and contribute to.
openSource.openSourceDesc: Developed under the MIT license, free for personal and commercial use.
openSource.communityDrivenDesc: Built with the feedback and contributions of the developer community.
openSource.regularUpdatesDesc: Continuously improved with the latest technologies and best practices.

blog.title: Our Publications
blog.subtitle: Explore the latest news, tutorials, and articles from our team.

about.title: About War3Map.net
about.description: Learn about War3Map.net's story, mission, and vision.

story.title: Our Story
story.content: War3Map.net was born from a simple reason: a love for Warcraft III. Like many players, we grew up with custom maps — RPG adventures, tower defense games, survival challenges, and countless experimental worlds created by passionate makers. Over the years, we came to realize: Warcraft III is more than just a game. It's a platform where creators build worlds and players experience stories. Yet, many wonderful maps are scattered across different websites, lost in forums, or slowly disappearing. We created War3Map.net to help preserve these creations — and more importantly, to help the community continue creating new worlds.

finalWords.title: Final Words
finalWords.content: Time flies, but the emotions Warcraft III gave us never fade. Those wonderful worlds born in the map editor, those late nights fighting alongside friends — these form our shared youth memories. We refuse to see these creative and passionate works disappear with time. Therefore, War3Map.net is more than just an archive — it's a home we've built for everyone who loves this land. Here, every preserved map is a tribute to the creators' efforts; every sincere share and discussion continues the vitality of this community. We've only just begun this journey. Its future is in the hands of every one of you who is willing to stay and contribute. Because what truly makes this game eternal is never the code or engine, but the countless yous behind the screen who still hold love. Thank you to everyone who makes this place special.

values.title: Our Principles
values.subtitle: Guiding principles for our daily work
values.missionDesc: Our mission is simple: To build a home where players and creators grow together. War3Map.net is more than just a download site. It's a community where: - Players can discover, share, and discuss maps - Creators can showcase their work and build reputation - Contributors can add tutorials, translations, voiceovers, and more - Everyone can help shape the platform's future We believe the best communities are not built by one person, but by everyone together.
values.communityDesc: Community-Driven Development One of our core principles: This website is built with the community, not just for the community. We provide a public feature voting system where: - Anyone can suggest new features - Users and creators can vote on what matters most - The most requested features are prioritized for development This means you're not just a user. You're part of the building team. Your voice directly shapes the future of War3Map.net.
values.forPlayersDesc: If you're a player, War3Map.net can help you: - Find high-quality maps - Discover hidden gems - Learn through guides and tutorials - Share your gaming experiences with others
values.forCreatorsDesc: If you're a map creator, War3Map.net can help you: - Showcase your work to a global audience - Build your creator profile - Share updates, tutorials, and videos - Grow your reputation and audience Our long-term goal is to support creators as much as possible.
values.visionDesc: We hope War3Map.net will become: - A complete archive of Warcraft III custom maps - A platform where creators can grow and gain recognition - A place where players feel at home - A community that keeps Warcraft III alive for future generations
values.builtByCommunityDesc: War3Map.net is an independent project. It's built by players. Supported by creators. And shaped by everyone who participates. If you want to contribute — whether by sharing maps, reporting issues, suggesting features, or helping others — we're always welcome.
